meanings.definition: A representation, usually on a flat surface, of a region of the earth or heavens.
meanings.sent1: I used maps to find my way around the city.
meanings.sent2: The maps in the library helped me locate the books I needed.
meanings.sent3: The child drew colorful maps of imaginary lands on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: Her mind maps of complex ideas made studying easier.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led the pirates to a hidden chest.

meanings.definition: A diagrammatic representation of an area of land or sea showing physical features, cities, roads, etc.
meanings.sent1: The maps displayed the different hiking trails in the park.
meanings.sent2: She studied the maps to plan the best route for the road trip.
meanings.sent3: The artist created unique maps of underwater cities in her paintings.
meanings.sent4: His heart maps out a path to her love.
meanings.sent5: The treasure hunter followed the old map to the buried treasure.

meanings.sent1: She maps out the best spots for picnics in the park.
meanings.sent2: The cartographer maps the uncharted territories with precision.
meanings.sent3: He maps his progress in learning new languages on a chart.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship maps a journey of shared memories.
meanings.sent5: The explorer maps the stars to navigate through the night sky.
